title: MonkeGodz
description: 333 supply programmatically generated pixel gods NFT collection that will be released on NEAR. Each MonkeGodz holder will be able to cast a vote on the DeityDao, which will pave the way for the project's future!

hero.title: join the godz
hero.body:
333 programmatically-generated pixel god NFTs released on NEAR.

Each MonkeGodz holder will gain voting rights in DeityDAO, paving the way for the project's future!

signedIn.ps:

Get in on it! [Join our Discord](https://discord.gg/DrkatBA5ud) and request an invite.

presale.ps: Only REMAINING_COUNT left. Get in on it:

vip.ps: REMAINING_COUNT remain. Art thou ready for divinity?

allSold.title: All INITIAL_COUNT minted!
allSold.body: The MonkeGodz have all been created
